conbody.p: Any important or noteworthy query in the Query History window can be set to starred. This allows you to view all/only important queries at once.
To set a query to Starred, right-click (CTRL+click) on it in the Query History window and choose Set starred, or select the query and click the star to the left of its name in the Info field.
To unstar a previously starred query, right-click (CTRL+click) on it and choose Set unstarred, or select the query and click the star to the left of its name in the Info field.
To view only Starred queries, click the star at the top left corner of the list of queries.
